question: Please Tell me in Detailed if Prophet Muhammad (PBUH) solely for the Arabs ?
answer:
QUESTION

 

 Please Tell me in Detailed if Prophet Muhammad (PBUH) solely for the Arabs ?

ANSWER


Share:

In the name of Allah, Most Gracious, Most Merciful

Assalaamu `alaykum waRahmatullahi Wabarakatoh

Rasulullah (SAW) is the final prophet and messenger of Allah. There is no prophet to come after Rasulullah (SAW). Allah sent prophets to guide mankind. All the previous prophets came for a particular nation and a particular time. Rasulullah (SAW) is the last prophet and therefore he is for all mankind forever. Rasulullah (SAW) is for Arabs and non-Arabs. Allah says, “And we did not send you but as a mercy for the worlds” (Ambiya).

And Allah knows best

Wassalam

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
Darul Iftaa
